Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Requires public retirement systems to post board meeting minutes on their websites
Summary: Requires public retirement systems to post board meeting minutes on their websites to the extent practicable or otherwise required by law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, the education law, and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring boards of trustees of public retirement systems to post board meeting minutes on their websites
